description:
One pole for all season use. With touring features from grip to tip, these light poles are made for backcountry users who dabble across the alpine in all seasons. The adjustable length plus extended grip makes this pole a versatile sidekick for all your mountain shenanigans.

  • 7075-T6 aluminum construction is light, durable and economical
  • 3-piece design compacts down small
  • Powerlock 3.0 mechanism is strong and easy to secure
  • Insulating EVA grips with rubber extensions so you can move your hand lower on the shaft
  • Padded straps are buckle-free for comfort
  • Interchangeable Vario snowflake baskets with carbide tips
name: MEC Tour 3 Poles
